content: this cowl is born out of curiosity about bias knitting it also serves as a almost fully reversible cowl for my daughters - as kids do not much care about right and wrong side i wanted to create something that would be easily wearable it has mebius loop form and its length is easily adjustable tag pictures on social media with #birdcherrycowl 1 and tag @jekdmi designs 2 i m always happy to see your projects **construction** the double cowl has a mebius loop shape starting from one corner and shaping it with increases after necessary width is reached increases on one side are continued and on the other side increases are replaced with decreases shaping the cowl the main part is worked in garter stitch with i-cord edges in two places classic shetland diamond lace insertions are made after the full length is reached on the longer side the second corner is shaped with decreases on both sides after knitting is completed the cowl is connected in the mebus loop by sewing short sides together **sizes** one size adjustable the final measurements depend on yarn needle size knitting gauge and blocking the size of samples - boucle cowl height 14 cm 5½ in length 120 cm / 47¼ in - neutral cowl height 14 cm 5½ in length 145 cm / 57 in **yarn** yarn a dk weight 11 wpi 200-220 m / 220-240 yds / 100 g yarn b fingering weight 14 wpi 400-420 m / 435-460 yds / 100 g yarn a can be also be a combination of two yarns held together - fingering weight 14 wpi 400-420 m / 435-460 yds / 100 g and - silk mohair lace weight yarn used in samples - boucle cowl - yarn a 105 m / 115 yds / 50 g of boucle dk from yeah yeah yarns in colorway furcifer pardalis 220 m / 240 yds / 100 g - yarn b 90 m / 100 yds / 22 g of huasco sock kettle dyes from araucania yarns 401 m / 439 yds / 100 g in colorway 1010 byzantium - neutral cowl note that mohair yarn is given twice - in yarn a and yarn b but it is the total amount of mohair thread used - yarn a held together - 220 m / 240 yds / 55 g of merino trial & horror from elk market yarn 401 m / 439 yds / 100 g - 255 m / 280 yds / 30 g le petit silk & mohair from biches & bûches 212 m / 232 yds / 25 g in colorway 3162 rose grey - yarn b 255 m / 280 yds / 30 g le petit silk & mohair from biches & bûches 212 m / 232 yds / 25 g in colorway 3162 rose grey **gauge** though it affects the final size of a scarf/stole the gauge is not important for this project gauge on both samples ~23 sts x
